description.@en: You are a natural wrestler, using paralyzing grapples in close quarters combat.

effect.@en: You penalize your foeâ€™s ability to Resist a Chokehold and Dirty Tricks by a -10 Base Chance to their Skill Test. In addition, when you use a Chokehold, add an additional 1D10 to determine how much physical Peril you inflict.
